PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-14622012-11-01,  ,  ,  JUS, 
ActContraventions Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Contraventions Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending the CONTRAVENTIONS REGULATIONS (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to ensure (1) that enforcement officers have the most appropriate tool when charging minor offences related to radiocommunication; and (2) consistency between the Contraventions Regulations and the Radiocommunication Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0236 Publication Date: 2012-11-21
AttachmentsAttachment
